messages.message:
Hi Team - I've been asked by vendor management at a prospect Wise: 'Do you have a document or policy fully describing the use of generative AI and ML at Instabase you can share with us?'

Has an asset like this been created already for AI Hub? Alternatively, has something like this been created for Enterprise which we can adapt? (cc: @Matt Weaver @Lee @Tom @hannah @Chris @aristo @peter) I imagine at larger customers that this will come up often from their vendor teams.

Attaching the survey (https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/13lZU1o--NaXPdQewc0vFGRzmHLI5lEeV/edit#gid=858826395) they sent over which initially asked around some of these themes which was filled in by our team.
To my knowledge, we do not have this - at least from a security maintained standpoint.
